title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £30,000 African adventure
text: Imagine Africa and Azura Boutique Retreats have partnered together to offer a holiday of a lifetime for two lucky winners to Tanzania and Mozambique: an epic 18 night safari and beach combination worth £30.7k. The trip starts and ends in luxury with international business class flights and includes transfers by helicopter. The prizewinners will enjoy 5 nights on safari at the famous Selous Game Reserve staying at luxurious Azura Selous; 5 nights at Azura at Quilalea situated in northern Mozambique’s untouched Quirambas islands; and 6 nights at remote, barefoot Azura Benguerra located on the Bazaruto Islands. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . The prize Imagine Africa and Azura Boutique Retreats have partnered together to give away a holiday of a lifetime for two lucky winners to Tanzania and Mozambique, an epic 18 night safari and beach combination worth over £30.7k. The trip starts in luxury with international business class flights to Dar es Salaam; upon arrival the prizewinners will be transferred to the Selous Game Reserve where they will spend five nights at Azura Selous . Set in an exclusive part of the Selous, they are unlikely to see another safari vehicle during their stay. They will be put up in a luxurious air-conditioned tented villa with stone bathrooms, indoor and outdoor showers and a private plunge pool overlooking the Great Ruaha River. The prize winners will spend their time on game drives, walking safaris, and enjoying the dining on the delicious cuisine of Azura in different locations around the camp and reserve. The holiday continues by taking a short coastal flight to Pemba where they will spend one night at the Avani Pemba Beach Hotel before heading off by helicopter to the remote Quirimbas Archipelago in northern Mozambique. For the next five nights, they will be staying in a Kusi Villa at Azura at Quilalea , an exclusive beach lodge. Small with only 9 villas, it is really in keeping with the inhabited nature of the island. It is a firm favourite of ours at Imagine Africa with its personalised touches and a high standard of service. Quilalea's restaurant and lounge are on a peninsula at the northern tip of the island, with tremendous sea views on both sides. After relaxing on this island, it is onto the next destination. The prizewinners will be transferred by helicopter from the Quirimbas Archipelago before spending 1 night in Johannesburg at The Peech. The next day the prizewinners will take another helicopter journey, this time a deserted beach on the western edge of Benguerra Island, Mozambique. For six nights, winners will stay in barefoot luxury in an infinity villa at Azura Benguerra . Here, they will spend their days relaxing on postcard perfect beaches, snorkelling, diving and dining on gourmet cuisine. All meals and house drinks are included in the holiday. Contact details: www.imagineafrica.co.uk ; info@imagineafrica.co.uk ; 0203 7408 547 The prize providers Imagine Africa is an award-winning tour operator specialising in tailor-made holidays to Africa. It has a simple mission: to give clients an incredible holiday to Africa, for incredible value. Imagine Africa’s difference is its knowledge and honesty: its travel specialists know Africa like no-one else and excel at bringing holidays to life for their clients in ways that perfectly match their passions and preferences. If they don’t think something is right, they won’t sell it. From honeymoons to bucket-list trips, Imagine Africa can be trusted to provide holidays of a lifetime again and again. Azura offers some of Africa’s ultimate private luxury hideaways in some of the world’s most undiscovered, pristine environments where authenticity of the experience is key. Privately owned and managed, the hotels are small and personalised, with award-winning 'eco-chic' villas, delicious local cuisine, and a whole range of unique experiences to enjoy. The authenticity of the experience, without compromising on standards, is what makes these properties great, along with the philanthropic goal of both protecting the environment and giving back to the local community. Terms and conditions The prize is for 2 people and is be valid for the whole of 2016, excluding 24-27th March, April and May (when Azura Selous is closed) and 22nd Dec – 8th Jan 2017. The prize includes international flights, transfers, accommodation and board as described, plus park fees; prizewinners may be able to add additional experiences at their own expense. Travel insurance is excluded from the prize but is mandatory for travel and policy details must be provided to Imagine Africa. In exceptional circumstances, Imagine Africa reserves the right to change the itinerary. No credit or cash alternative will be offered if the prize is not taken. Telegraphtravel
